snippet: The Labor Department said on Tuesday that employers posted 3.9 million job openings, up 1.5 percent from December.
abstract: Labor Department says that employers advertised 3.9 million job openings in January 2014, up 1.5 percent from December 2013, sign that hiring should remain steady in coming months.
lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said on Tuesday that employers posted 3.9 million job openings, up 1.5 percent from December.

headline.main: More Job Ads Seen as a Sign of Steady Hiring
